sn55.35:1.1: “Mendicants, these four footprints of the gods are in order to purify unpurified beings and cleanse unclean beings.
sn55.35:2.2: Firstly, a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the Buddha:
sn55.35:2.3: ‘That Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.’
sn55.35:2.5: ‘What now is the footprint of the gods?’
sn55.35:2.7: ‘I hear that these days the gods consider non-harming to be supreme.
sn55.35:2.8: But I don’t hurt any creature firm or frail.
sn55.35:2.9: I definitely live in possession of a footprint of the gods.’
sn55.35:2.10: This is the first footprint of the gods in order to purify unpurified beings and cleanse unclean beings.
sn55.35:3.1: Furthermore, a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the teaching …
sn55.35:4.1: Furthermore, a noble disciple’s ethical conduct is loved by the noble ones, unbroken, impeccable, spotless, and unmarred, liberating, praised by sensible people, not mistaken, and leading to immersion.
sn55.35:4.3: ‘What now is the footprint of the gods?’
sn55.35:4.5: ‘I hear that these days the gods consider non-harming to be supreme.
sn55.35:4.6: But I don’t hurt any creature firm or frail.
sn55.35:4.7: I definitely live in possession of a footprint of the gods.’
sn55.35:4.8: This is the fourth footprint of the gods in order to purify unpurified beings and cleanse unclean beings.
sn55.35:4.9: These four footprints of the gods are in order to purify unpurified beings and cleanse unclean beings.”
